price: 58. Diggah Yalli usuk rizqhi yacayi, dudda-li kaxxa maqar-li.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلۡقُوَّةِ ٱلۡمَتِينُ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha huwa al-razāqu dhū al-quwati al-matīnu
